ttp_template:
<group name="answer_dns_server_query_query_status">
Querying DNS Server: {{DNS_SERVER | ORPHRASE}}
Request Time:  {{REQUEST_TIME | ORPHRASE}}
Query:  {{QUERY | ORPHRASE}}
Response Time:  {{RESPONSE_TIME | ORPHRASE}}
Answer:  {{ANSWER | ORPHRASE}}
Query Status:  {{QUERY_STATUS | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
Querying DNS Server: 8.8.8.8
Request Time:       2023-10-01 12:34:56
Query:              example.com
Response Time:      2023-10-01 12:34:57
Answer:             93.184.216.34
Query Status:       SUCCESS
textfsm_template:
Value DNS_SERVER (\S+)
Value REQUEST_TIME (\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2} \d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2})
Value QUERY (\S+)
Value RESPONSE_TIME (\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2} \d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2})
Value ANSWER (\d{1,3}(\.\d{1,3}){3})
Value QUERY_STATUS (\S+)

Start
  ^Querying DNS Server:\s+${DNS_SERVER}\s*$$
  ^Request Time:\s+${REQUEST_TIME}\s*$$
  ^Query:\s+${QUERY}\s*$$
  ^Response Time:\s+${RESPONSE_TIME}\s*$$
  ^Answer:\s+${ANSWER}\s*$$
  ^Query Status:\s+${QUERY_STATUS}\s*$$ -> Record
